translation.en: No, he makes you feel less alone.
translation.zh: ‎不 他是让你不那么孤独

translation.en: Okay. What's wrong with that, huh?
You're stuck in a fairy tale.
These guys don't love you, okay?
translation.zh: ‎这些男人并不爱你 好吗？

translation.en: They use you and then they throw you away, and you let them.
translation.zh:
‎他们利用你 然后抛弃你
‎你任由他们这样

translation.en: That sounds more like you than me, but okay.
translation.zh: ‎这听起来更像是说你 不过好吧

translation.en: You getting drunk and hooking up
with every Tommy, Doomy and Harry that you meet?
translation.zh: ‎然后和你见到的所有张三李四上床？

translation.en: Friend, you're not going to be young and beautiful forever.
translation.zh: ‎朋友 你不会永远年轻漂亮的

translation.en: And then what? What will you be left with, hmm?
translation.zh: ‎到了那时候怎么办？你还有什么？

translation.en: My self-respect. For not settling for trash.
translation.zh: ‎我的自尊 不为垃圾而抛弃的自尊

translation.en: when the only difference is you don't get paid for it?
I... [sighs] Friend, I didn't mean that.
translation.zh: ‎我…朋友 我不是这个意思

translation.en: [Noni] Do what you always do, okay?
Take your things. Move in with him.
translation.zh: ‎带上你的东西 搬去和他住

translation.en: But this time... don't come back, because now I'm done.
translation.zh:
‎不过这一次…
‎别回来了 因为我受够了

translation.en: -Are you sure it's okay if I stay here? -Yeah. Come here.
translation.zh:
‎-你确定我可以住这里？
‎-对 过来

translation.en: Look, I don't want you to ever leave again. Okay?
translation.zh: ‎我不想再离开你了 好吗？

translation.en: Yeah, we had been dating for, like, a few months.
translation.zh: ‎对 我们大概在一起几个月

translation.en: [in English] Is that what happened to you?
[Lunga] No, I can only do tonight, that's the thing.
translation.zh: ‎不 我只有今晚有空 是这个问题

translation.en: No, you don't have to do that.
I'll meet you at the Silver Star Hotel at 8:00. How's that?
translation.zh: ‎我八点去银色之星酒店见你 好吗？

translation.en: You...You're back early. How... are you?
translation.zh: ‎你…你提前回来了 你好吗？

translation.en: Uh, work. You know me. I work, work... I just work.
translation.zh:
‎工作的事 你知道我的
‎我要工作 工作…就是工作

translation.en: They want me to meet some new client tonight.
translation.zh: ‎他们想让我今晚和一些新客户见面

translation.en: -So I have to do that. I know... -Tonight?
translation.zh:
‎-所以我只好赴约 我知道…
‎-今晚？

translation.en: No, baby, 'cause tomorrow morning is your birthday.
translation.zh: ‎不行 宝贝 因为明早是你生日

translation.en: And the rest of the day is your birthday as well.
I don't want to work on your birthday. [stammers] I'm... I'm not gonna.
translation.zh: ‎我不想在你生日当天工作 我不会的

translation.en: Are you hungry? Did you eat?
I'm hungry. I could eat. You look beautiful.
translation.zh:
‎我饿了 我可以吃点东西
‎你看起来真美

translation.en: I'm gonna make some food, okay?
I'm at this hotel 'cause Lunga has this meeting,
and I'm just sitting at this lobby and...
Uh, his parents. I recognize them from the photos, but...
translation.zh: ‎他父母 我照片上见过他们 不过…

translation.en: Why wouldn't he tell me his parents are here?
translation.zh: ‎他为什么不告诉我他父母来了？

translation.en: Oh, they're here for your surprise party.
translation.zh: ‎他们是来给你过惊喜派对的

translation.en: What... what... what surprise? For me?

translation.zh: ‎宝贝 亲爱的 这好棒

translation.en: Oh, my God, you guys. This is...
-[Dineo] I'm fine. Okay. Okay. -You're good, you're good.

translation.zh:
‎-生日快乐 宝贝
‎-我好惊喜

translation.en: Hello, Mama. Nice to meet you.
translation.zh: ‎你好 阿姨 很高兴见到你

translation.en: You, too. So nice to meet you.
You know what? You are so lucky
[in Sotho] to have a man like him.
[in Sotho] Oh, my goodness. You know, he does things in style.
[in English] Let me just go check on something with the manager quickly.
translation.zh: ‎我去找经理有点事 很快就回来

translation.en: I'm so glad, Duri, you are back together again.
translation.zh: ‎我好高兴 杜里 你们又复合了

translation.en: Now you can buy that big house ya lona, the dream house. Together.
translation.zh:
‎你现在可以买属于你的大房子了
‎一起买梦想中的房子

translation.en: This man is going to look after you, my child.
translation.zh: ‎这个人会照顾你的 我的孩子

translation.en: [in Sotho] He's not like your father.
-He's committed, and I can tell. -Ah, Mama.
translation.zh:
‎-他很专情 我看得出来
‎-妈妈

translation.en: [in English] A few of Lunga's friends want to meet Didi,
translation.zh: ‎兰加的一些朋友想见见迪迪

translation.en: so I'm gonna steal her for a few minutes.
-[Dineo] But who are all these people? -I have no idea.
Well, someone has to keep you sane around your mother.
translation.zh: ‎总要有人在你妈面前管好你

‎-对
‎-你看起来像一个完美娇妻

translation.en: Dineo, baby, can you please come stand here next to me?
translation.zh:
‎迪尼奥 宝贝
‎你能过来站到我旁边吗？

translation.en: Firstly, I, uh... I want to thank you all for joining us here today. Um...
translation.zh:
‎首先 我…
‎我想感谢今天在场的所有人

translation.en: Dineo and I have been through a lot as a couple.
translation.zh: ‎迪尼奥和我在一起经历了很多

translation.en: And having you all here to celebrate with us today means so much.
translation.zh:
‎今天你们来和我们一起庆祝
‎对我们意义非凡

translation.en: -Yeah, we've had a few bumps on the road. -[all chuckling]
translation.zh: ‎对 我们的情路并不一帆风顺

translation.en: Right now I just want to make sure that we we never lose each other again.
translation.zh: ‎现在我想确保我们不会再失去彼此了

translation.en: Oh, shit. Everyone take out your phones, 'cause if we miss this, she'll kill us.
translation.zh:
‎该死 大家请拿出你们的手机
‎因为如果我们没拍到她会杀了我们的

translation.en: You fight for love even when it seems impossible.
translation.zh: ‎你会争取看似不可能的爱情

translation.en: You take care of me. You make me a better man.
translation.zh: ‎你照顾我 让我成为一个更好的人

translation.en: And I hope you'll keep doing that for the rest of our lives.
translation.zh:
‎我希望
‎你在我们接下来的日子里也会这么做

translation.en: Dineo, what are you doing? What are you doing? What's going on?
translation.zh: ‎迪尼奥 你在干什么？怎么回事？

translation.en: To the hotel. I followed you, and I know it's crazy,
translation.zh: ‎跟踪你到了酒店 我知道这很荒谬

translation.en: but I thought I was gonna walk in on your bachelor party.
translation.zh: ‎不过我以为我又要闯入你的单身派对

translation.en: because that's exactly what happened. I walked in on your bachelor party,
translation.zh:
‎因为这确实发生过
‎我闯入了你的单身派对

translation.en: -and you married somebody else. -That was then.
That was then. That's my past.
translation.zh: ‎那是以前 那是我的过去

translation.en: I am here with you now.
[sighs] When... When in the entire time that we've known each other
translation.zh: ‎我们…我们在一起的这段时间

translation.en: have you shown me that you want me?

translation.zh: ‎不是一个填补空白的女朋友

translation.en: Not somebody who takes care of you, Lunga. Just me. Just me, Dineo.
translation.zh:
‎不是什么照顾你的人 兰加
‎我就是我 迪尼奥

translation.en: Three minutes ago when I got on one knee and I asked you to marry me.
translation.zh: ‎三分钟前我单膝跪下向你求婚

translation.en: Which is three months after you got divorced, right?
translation.zh: ‎这是你离婚三个月后 对吧？

translation.en: I'm not in love with you.
I'm in love with not being alone.
Lunga's failed proposal has gone viral, and you're no longer Desperate Bae.
translation.zh:
‎兰加求婚失败的视频传疯了
‎你不再是“绝望宝贝”了

translation.en: Ugh. Oh, God, I can't believe I did that.
translation.zh: ‎天啊 我不敢相信我这么做了

translation.en: Oh, you slayed emotional dragons today, friend.
translation.zh: ‎你今天战胜了情感 朋友

translation.en: Noni, being single is fine, right?
translation.zh: ‎诺尼 单身不要紧的 对吧？

translation.en: Sure as hell beats losing the right guy 'cause you're an idiot.
translation.zh:
‎当然如果失去对的人简直生不如死
‎因为你是白痴

translation.en: So bar boy is the right guy?
-[blows raspberry] -You know what? You know what?
If I can turn down a marriage proposal today,
translation.zh: ‎如果我今天可以拒绝一桩求婚

translation.en: -You can go win your man back. -Mmm.
I think we've had enough excitement for one day.

translation.zh: ‎不 今天 其实是现在

translation.en: I've cleaned my face and everything.
You can do it in five minutes... and he doesn't care.
translation.zh: ‎你五分钟内就能搞定 不过他不在乎

translation.en: [Max] I hope you guys are having a lovely evening.
[in English] I'm really sorry about the fight. And for breaking up with you.
translation.zh:
‎我很抱歉之前和你吵架
‎也为和你分手感到抱歉

translation.en: Nothing happened to me, okay? No one broke my heart.
translation.zh:
‎我什么事都没有 好吗？
‎没人伤我的心

translation.en: I just... I've seen so many people destroyed by love that I just...
translation.zh:
‎我只是…
‎我看过很多人被爱情所伤 我就…

translation.en: I built up walls and I made up rules.
translation.zh: ‎我建起了墙 设立了规则

translation.en: [in English] How do I really know you're ready to break those walls down?
translation.zh: ‎我怎么知道你准备好把墙推倒了？

translation.en: ♪ You are the one for me ♪
♪ And I am the one for you ♪
Please get me off the stage.
[in Xhosa] For someone without a place to stay, [in English] you have a lot of stuff.
translation.zh:
‎对一个没有自己房子的人来说
‎你东西还真多

translation.en: At least now there's room for you, Maxie, right?
translation.zh:
‎至少现在有地方留给你了
‎马克西 对吧？

translation.en: Okay, you guys, I think that's it. That's everything, yeah.
translation.zh:
‎好了 你们两个
‎我觉得东西都在这里了

translation.en: -Are you sure you've got this? -Yeah, promise.
translation.zh:
‎-你确定你能行？
‎-对 我保证

translation.en: I think we should go before she changes her mind.
translation.zh: ‎我觉得我们要在她改变主意前走人

translation.en: Mmm. You're gonna miss me, aren't you?

translation.zh:
‎-该马克斯了 过来 马克斯
‎-好

translation.en: Two more boxes of condoms for Room Pollux, please.
translation.zh: ‎波拉克斯房再来两盒避孕套

translation.en: My safe word is "beetroot." I said it three times.
translation.zh:
‎我的安全口令是“甜菜根”
‎我说了三次

translation.en: [in Zulu] Oh, you girls look beautiful.
Girl, is your father a terrorist?
translation.zh: ‎妹子 你父亲是恐怖分子吗？

translation.en: Are you a piece of cake?
'Cause I want a piece of that.
-[all laughing] -Can you try the other one?
[man] 'Cause you gonna be all over this...
[crew member] Let's redefine that so it's more prominent.
translation.zh: ‎我们重新定义一下 让它更突出

translation.en: [crew member] All right, we're gonna do it again.
And, Dineo, I just... I want to make sure that we never lose each other again.
translation.zh:
‎迪尼奥 我…
‎我想确保我们不会再失去彼此了

translation.en: [Noni] Holy shit. Pull out your phones, please.
translation.zh: ‎该死 大家请拿出你们的手机

translation.en: If we miss this, she's gonna kill us.
translation.zh: ‎如果我们没拍到 她会杀了我们的

translation.en: Was this your perfect wedding? [chuckles nervously]
-[woman] Next time, say it first. -[man] Go and try again.
-I was gonna call you. I just... -You know...
translation.zh:
‎-我是想打给你的 我只是…
‎-你知道

translation.en: Dineo, just let me explain that I was gonna...
translation.zh: ‎迪尼奥 你就让我解释一下 我要…
‎接着拍 重新就位 接着拍
